Analyte(s): Thyroid stimulating autoantibodies to TSH receptor (TSI)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CHO Mc4 cell line in 96-well microplate
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thyretain TSI Reporter BioAssay for qualitative detection of thyroid stimulating autoantibodies (TSI) in serum using a cell-based luciferase reporter assay for differential diagnosis of Graves' disease.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection in serum of thyroid stimulating autoantibodies to TSH receptors; detection aids differential diagnosis of Graves' disease in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings.
